step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen to feel the movement.
You're placing your hands correctly on your abdomen. Focus on feeling your belly rise as you inhale.
Great inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe out.
You're maintaining a comfortable posture. Continue placing hands on your abdomen for this repetition.
Hands are well-placed. Focus on the sensation of your abdomen expanding with each breath.
Nice deep inhale and muscle tightening. Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Well done relaxing and exhaling. Visualize that fluid being pushed out as you complete the breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose, tighten your whole body, and visualize fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing and visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the good work!
